title: The Big Small Business Rescue
description: There's a brand new government program with $349 billion in aid for small businesses. The problem? It was thrown together in a week. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.

itunes:title: The Big Small Business Rescue
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: This past week, millions of small business owners have been trying to take advantage of a $349 billion rescue program.
